documentType.label: other
reasons: Document is an insurance product informational sheet (MetLife) rather than a facility invoice, CMR form, or UB04.
Contains policy features, benefits and additional information sections typical of a brochure or policy summary.

fields.name: Title
fields.value: Policy Features and Benefits May Vary By State

fields.name: Section Header
fields.value: FEATURES & BENEFITS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE™ AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGE™

fields.name: Home and Community Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Home care services including Nursing Care, Therapy services, Care Advisory Services, Homemaker Services; Services provided by a Home Care Aide, Social Worker or Independent Caregiver; Hospice Care; Adult Day Care

fields.name: Facility Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Assisted Living Facility, Nursing Home, Hospice Facility

fields.name: Elimination Period
fields.value: 100 Calendar Days; Once per lifetime and cumulative

fields.name: Alternate Service Provision
fields.value: A MetLife Care Coordinator may authorize benefits for OLTC services not specifically defined as covered services under the policy, as long as the service meets needs of the insured and is a cost-effective alternative.

fields.name: Bed Reservation
fields.value: Reimburses up to 50 days per calendar year for actual charges incurred, to reserve insured's bed in a facility for any reason

fields.name: Return of Premium
fields.value: If insured dies on or before his/her 70th birthday, 100% of premiums paid, minus any benefits paid or payable, will be returned to insured's beneficiary or estate

fields.name: International Benefit
fields.value: Pays a cash benefit equal to 50% of the MBA when the insured is outside the U.S.; TBA limited to lesser of TBA loss benefits paid while insured in U.S. or 2% (or 50% of TBA); EP for International Benefit is doubled to 200 Calendar Days; If Cash Benefit Rider is added, International Benefit is modified; pays benefits outside US at 100% of MBA; EP will be 100 Calendar Days

fields.name: Contingent Benefit Upon Lapse
fields.value: Limited coverage if policy ends due to non-payment of premiums or insured's written request to cancel, following a substantial premium increase; Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA; Total benefits paid will not exceed the TBA immediately prior to nonforfeiture date

fields.name: Initial Needs Assessment
fields.value: 1 visit per lifetime; EP does not need to be satisfied; If Care Management organization is selected by MetLife – no cost to the insured; If Care Management organization is selected by the insured – reimbursed up to $275 per lifetime

fields.name: Premium Waiver
fields.value: Premiums waived when EP is satisfied and the insured is receiving payment of benefits

fields.name: Coordination of Benefits
fields.value: Coordination of Benefits (COB) and non-duplication of coverage with other MetLife LTCI coverage and Medicare (COB and non-duplication of coverage not applicable with Cash Benefit Rider)

fields.name: Additional Information Section Header
fields.value: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FOR ALL POLICIES

fields.name: Payment Options
fields.value: Standard Pay: Annual, Semi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly (EFT); 10 Year Premium Payment Rider – available at initial application only; N/A with FPO or GPO; May impact the tax deductibility of the premium; consult a tax advisor

fields.name: Care Coordination Services
fields.value: MetLife Care Coordinators are available to answer questions about LTC coverage, services and discounts in the insured's area; an insured can also call for advice about caring for a loved one who needs LTC services, even if their family member is not insured with MetLife

fields.name: Discounts
fields.value: 30% Spousal**; 15% Marital**; 15% Residential – 10% Preferred Health (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84) – 5% or 10% Multi-Life Discount for approved cases

fields.name: Underwriting Classes
fields.value: Preferred (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84), Standard & Substandard (Always quote Standard!)

fields.name: Save Age
fields.value: Premium based on age 30 days prior to application date (underwriting requirements based on age at date of signed application)

fields.name: Policy Effective Dates
fields.value: With Premium (Conditional Receipt may apply): Date all underwriting requirements are met; Without Premium: 28 days following underwriting approval date

fields.name: Free Look Period
fields.value: Insured has 30 days to review policy and if desired, return it for a full refund

fields.name: Policy Delivery
fields.value: Policy Delivery Receipt (PDR) must be signed within 30 days of Policy Approval Date

fields.name: Company Name
fields.value: Metropolitan Life Insurance Company

fields.name: Company Address
fields.value: New York, NY 10166

tables.caption: Features & Benefits (left column = Feature, right column = Details)

rows.value: Home and Community Care

Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Home care services including Nursing Care, Therapy services, Care Advisory Services, Homemaker Services; Services provided by a Home Care Aide, Social Worker or Independent Caregiver; Hospice Care; Adult Day Care
Facility Care
Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Assisted Living Facility, Nursing Home, Hospice Facility
Elimination Period
100 Calendar Days; Once per lifetime and cumulative
Alternate Service Provision

A MetLife Care Coordinator may authorize benefits for OLTC services not specifically defined as covered services under the policy, as long as the service meets the needs of the insured and is a cost-effective alternative.
Bed Reservation
Reimburses up to 50 days per calendar year for actual charges incurred, to reserve insured's bed in a facility for any reason
Return of Premium
If insured dies on or before his/her 70th birthday, 100% of premiums paid, minus any benefits paid or payable, will be returned to insured's beneficiary or estate
International Benefit

Pays a cash benefit equal to 50% of the MBA when the insured is outside the U.S.; TBA limited to lesser of TBA loss benefits paid while insured in the U.S.; EP for International Benefit doubled to 200 Calendar Days; If Cash Benefit Rider added, International Benefit modified to pay benefits outside US at 100% of MBA; EP will be 100 Calendar Days
Contingent Benefit Upon Lapse

Limited coverage if policy ends due to non-payment of premiums or insured's written request to cancel, following a substantial premium increase; provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to greater of total amount of premium paid or 1x MBA; total benefits paid will not exceed the TBA immediately prior to the nonforfeiture date
Initial Needs Assessment
1 visit per lifetime; EP does not need to be satisfied; If Care Management organization is selected by MetLife – no cost to the insured; If selected by insured – reimbursed up to $275 per lifetime
Premium Waiver
Premiums waived when EP is satisfied and the insured is receiving payment of benefits
Coordination of Benefits
Coordination of Benefits (COB) and non-duplication of coverage with other MetLife LTCI coverage and Medicare; not applicable with Cash Benefit Rider

tables.caption: Additional Information for All Policies (left column = Topic, right column = Details)

rows.value: Payment Options
Standard Pay: Annual, Semi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly (EFT); 10 Year Premium Payment Rider available at initial application only; may impact tax deductibility of premium; consult tax advisor
Care Coordination Services
MetLife Care Coordinators available to answer questions about LTC coverage, services and discounts; advice on caring for a loved one even if not insured with MetLife
Discounts
30% Spousal; 15% Marital; 15% Residential; 10% Preferred Health (N/A for insureds age 80-84); 5% or 10% Multi-Life Discount for approved cases
Underwriting Classes
Preferred (N/A for insureds age 80-84), Standard & Substandard (Always quote Standard!)
Save Age
Premium based on age 30 days prior to application date (underwriting based on age at date of signed application)
Policy Effective Dates
With Premium: Date all underwriting requirements are met (Conditional Receipt may apply); Without Premium: 28 days following underwriting approval date
Free Look Period
Insured has 30 days to review policy and return it for a full refund if desired
Policy Delivery
Policy Delivery Receipt (PDR) must be signed within 30 days of Policy Approval Date
